sense.def:
A reflection of a person's attitude or a situation
kaže, da ima človek določeno stališče ali da se je znašel v določenih okoliščinah.

seg.quote: Their behaviour was a reflection of their very different personalities.

sense.def:
A reflection
so tudi okoliščine ali dogodek, ki ljudi privede do tega, da se začnejo zavedati določenega vidika neke osebe ali stvari.

seg.quote: This is a very sad reflection on the state of the Labour Party.

sense.def:
A reflection
je slika, ki jo lahko vidimo v ogledalu ali vodi.

seg.quote: She was standing there looking at her reflection in the mirror.

sense.def:
Reflection
je to, da svetloba ali toplota ne more prodreti skozi neko površino, ampak se od nje odbije;

Reflection
so misli, ki se o določeni stvari oblikujejo v glavi.

seg.quote: ‘You ought to take it,’ she said, after a moment's reflection.
Furious flashes of light jolted me out of my reflections.
